TopicTitle: [Video Showcase] Show off your stunt planes, rockets, and rovers

Articles.Content:
Stock or Mod

I'd share the craft file but I had to reinstall ksp and lost it

Its mostly stock except for a mirrored KW Rocketry Fin. It pretty much takes off and lands anywhere.

I've landed and taken off from the mountain tops near KSC several times. water is a no go though(maybe in my next version).

Stock physics(think near/far would rip it apart)
